sentences.sContent: I didn't know my times tables but I could milk a goat and ride a horse.
sentences.sCn: 我不知道乘法口诀表，但我知道如何给山羊挤奶和骑马。

sentences.sContent: Adventure advice: You can also ride a horse. Mongolia has the most horses per person in the world.
sentences.sCn: 探险建议：你也可以骑马。蒙古是世界上每人拥有马匹数目最多的地方。

sentences.sContent: Whether you’re interested in Western- or English-style horseback riding, some simple information can help you learn to ride a horse fast.
sentences.sCn: 无论你是对美国西部的还是英式的骑马方式感兴趣，以下简单的提示可以让你快速的学会骑马。
